data.approach: Enhance existing network capture: 1) Add timing info (request duration, TTFB), 2) Filter sensitive headers (Authorization, cookies), 3) Capture request/response headers and body size, 4) Implement HAR-like export format, 5) Add configurable request limit

summary: Added comprehensive network types with HAR-compatible format
Implemented timing info capture (total time, TTFB, receive time)
Added sensitive header filtering (Authorization, cookies, API keys)
Capture request/response headers with body size
HAR export functionality for network requests
Configurable request limits and capture types
reviewFocus: Verify HAR export format matches spec
Check sensitive header list is comprehensive

summary: Implemented comprehensive network request capture using WebRequest API
Created logging mechanism for storing last N network requests with detailed metadata
Developed export functionality in HAR-like format with sensitive header filtering

suggestedTasks.title: Add Unit Tests for Network Request Capture Module
suggestedTasks.description: Create comprehensive unit tests for the network request capture functionality. Tests should validate request logging, filtering of sensitive headers, and HAR export mechanism. Focus on edge cases like large requests, multiple simultaneous requests, and various HTTP methods.
suggestedTasks.reason: Ensure reliability and correctness of new network capture feature

suggestedTasks.title: Performance Optimization for Network Request Storage
suggestedTasks.description: Review and optimize the storage and retrieval mechanism for network requests. Implement efficient data structure and consider memory management strategies for large numbers of captured requests. Evaluate current implementation's performance under high-traffic scenarios.
suggestedTasks.reason: Potential performance bottleneck in request capture mechanism

patterns: Use WebRequest API for network request interception
Export network requests in HAR-like format
gotchas: Ensure minimal performance overhead during request capturing
Be cautious of memory usage with large number of stored requests

documentationNeeds: Update extension README with network capture feature details
Document WebRequest API usage and request logging mechanism
